definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to feel embarrassed/to find it embarrassing/to be sorry (for inconveniencing sb)
to have the nerve/what a cheek!/to feel no shame/to overcome the shame/(is it) proper? (rhetorical question)
to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions

sentences.english: Though she meant well, she was often chastised for being the teacher's pet.
sentences.chinese: 雖然她是好意，可她因爲是老師的寵兒而常被懲罰。

sentences.english: It’s so nice to be able to come “down under’’ to Sydney, thanks to your kind invitation.
sentences.chinese: 你好意邀請，才使我們能夠“南下”雪梨。

sentences.english: I am only ashamed of his asking so little.
sentences.chinese: 他要得這麼少，我倒覺得不好意思呢。

sentences.english: However see him one face determined, six Shis thousand also have no not bashful fight him.
sentences.chinese: 不過看他一臉堅決，陸蒔千也沒好意思打擊他。

sentences.english: This praise and confidence smote Dobbin's heart very keenly.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的誇獎和信賴弄得都賓十分不好意思。

sentences.english: Try to be patient with Mrs. Tanner, she means well.
sentences.chinese: 對杜納太太要耐心點，她是好意的。

sentences.english: Readhead believes that, despite their best intentions, parents can be obstacles.
sentences.chinese: 瑞德赫德相信，就算心懷好意，家長也可能成爲阻礙。

sentences.english: Mmmm that it's all for the best?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，那一切都出於好意嗎？

sentences.english: An overflowing laundry basket stares menacingly from the corner of the room.
sentences.chinese: 房間角落裏，裝得滿滿的洗衣籃不懷好意地盯着我。

sentences.english: I'm afraid we only have distilled water. Is that all right?
sentences.chinese: 不好意思我們這隻有蒸餾水，可以嗎？

sentences.english: I thought he said he was shy about singing?
sentences.chinese: 我還以爲他說他不好意思一展歌喉呢。
我告訴了克麗絲汀他的好意。

sentences.english: That’s very kind of you but I’m afraid I have a prior engagement.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝您的好意，不過我已經有約在先了。

sentences.english: Excuse me while I pack for California.
sentences.chinese: 我要整理行裝前往加利福尼亞，不好意思就此打住。

sentences.english: Timmy Tapper: Oh, sorry. Can I just say one more thing?
sentences.chinese: 哦，不好意思。我能再說幾句話嗎？

definition: I appreciate your kindness (conventional reply to turn down an offer)
to tactfully decline/to turn down gracefully
to feel grateful to sb/to appreciate the kindness
Don't get a reward if it's not deserved. (idiom)
